## Builder.tab() method

Adds a tab control

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tab(label: string, cb: (builder: Builder) => void): TabData & Removable;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  label | <code>string</code> | The tab label |
|  cb | <code>(builder: Builder) =&gt; void</code> | A callback allowing to build sub controls |

<b>Returns:</b>

`TabData & Removable`
